item.title: I would like to stress once again I do not aim to speak for these communities
item.description:
I would like to stress once again I do not aim to speak for these communities. I aim to have you stop speaking for them because the trend within black radical thought is striking and nearly ubiquitous: the struggle of the internationally imperialised peoples is the same as the struggle of the oppressed within America



(Feed generated with FetchRSS)

item.title: You must consider why these protests are being highlighted and not other ones, why does there seem to be an insurgent push?
item.description:
You must consider why these protests are being highlighted and not other ones, why does there seem to be an insurgent push? Why does there seem to be a massive universal consensus? And why does it all seem to be to America’s benefit?



(Feed generated with FetchRSS)
